operations.title: Manage webhooks (@todo: implement webhooks)
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can create, edit and delete webhooks

operations.title: Manage own messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can edit/delete their own messages inside channels

operations.title: Manage messages
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can edit/delete messages inside channels

operations.title: Manage reactions
operations.subtitle: Members with this permission can add new reactions to a message
